sentences.sentence: It is one of the safest cars in the world.
sentences.translation: 这是世界上最安全的车型之一。

sentences.sentence: Self-deprecating humor is usually the safest type, but here again you don't want to overshoot the target.
sentences.translation: 自嘲式幽默通常是最安全的，但是自嘲时你又不想做得太过。

sentences.sentence: It will be safest for you.
